name: Kali Sarda River rafting expedition
description:
Located in the Indo-Nepal border, the Mahakali River trip is one of the thrilling and exciting river rafting cruises in India. Sparkling water bodies and the sandy beaches of the Mahakali River advance toward the Kumaoni villages. Wilderness alongside magnificence of these locales will surely add to a rafting journey of a lifetime!

While rafting in these regions, the rafters can have the enthralling experience of cruising the mighty grade ‘III’ and ‘+IV’ rapids on Chuka, Dimberghat and the Creek points. Along with rafting, the trip will also offer the astounding opportunity to explore stunning waterfall and a popular Mahseer fishing site in India.
